revisionDesc.change: Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
Crosswalked to EpiDoc XML from both

div.p:
To [NN], royal [scribe] of the Arsinoite nome, Polemon division, from M[e]the, daughter of Panam[eus, the son of NN], mother Thaumastes from [the village – – –] with her guardian, her kinsman [– – –phis, son of] Aurelius. There belongs to my son Noumas in the village a 1/3 of an oikopedon, in which I register with my family for the house-by-house registration of the past 14th year of Aurelius Antoninus Caesar, the lord. And I am Methe the above mentioned, 32 years old, and (I register) my daughter The, 3 years old, and the son born to me from my husband Tithoes, being my brother by the same father and the same mother, Noumas, 1 year old, and the brother of Methe by the same mother Her– – –] 14 years old, and the mother of Methe and Her Thaumastes, daughter of Orseus, mother , 48 years old, and the nephew of Thaumastes, phis, son of Aurelius, the son of Orseus, mother Tephorsa[is, x year old], There belongs to Methe and her son Noumas parts
– – –.
